Zip a set of files for easy sharing

Source: R/llm_helpers.R
zip_llm_bundle.Rd

Zip a set of files for easy sharing

Usage

zip_llm_bundle(files, zipfile)

Arguments

files

Character vector of file paths.

zipfile

Path to the zip file to create.

Value

The path to the created zip file.
